      • CheckDB

        public boolean CheckDB(int timeout)
        Checks that the current database connection is still valid.
        Parameters:
        timeout - number of seconds to wait before timing out
        Returns:
        true if the database connection is valid, otherwise false

      • CheckDB

        public boolean CheckDB()

      • Close

        public void Close()

      • DealInsert

        public boolean DealInsert(java.lang.String table,
                          java.lang.String[] row,
                          int fileId)
        Inserts a row containing deal data into the specified table with reference to the file it came from.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the SQL table to insert data into.
        row - an array containing a row's data
        fileId - the FILE_ID corresponding to the data's source file
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • FileAppend

        public boolean FileAppend(java.lang.String filename)
        Inserts an entry into the LOADED_FILES table to indicate a file has been loaded.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to add to the LOADED_FILES table
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • FileCheck

        public int FileCheck(java.lang.String filename)
        Checks a given file against those already loaded into the database.
        Parameters:
        filename - the local path to the file in question
        Returns:
        fileId the FILE_ID corresponding to an already-loaded file, -1 if the file has not already been loaded
